name: koa-openapiv3
description: this is a koa middleware ï¼Œthat validates header&cookie&params&body&parameters based on openapiv3 and displays doc and cli print routing information

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && npm run copy
scripts.prelease: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version prerelease && git push --tags --force && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version patch && git push --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version minor && git push --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version major && git push --tags && git push && npm publish

author: wangjianliang
